attributes.action: End toilet restrictions & give girls free period products in all UK schools.
attributes.additional_details: We want the Government to act because many schools are restricting girls’ toilet access, forcing them to wait, carry passes, or explain private health issues. This is harmful, humiliating, and can cause pain, urinary problems, anxiety, and missed lessons. Schools must provide free sanitary products, clean, safe, and private toilets, and train staff to handle period needs with dignity. Every girl deserves safety, respect, and basic human rights.
attributes.background: We want the Government to ensure all schoolgirls can use toilets freely, access free sanitary products, and be treated with dignity. Schools must keep toilets clean, safe, and private, and train staff to handle period needs respectfully. No girl should suffer shame or pain for needing the bathroom.

rejection.details:
There are already open petitions which cover the issues raised by this petition: 

Fund free period pads
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733282

Fund free menstrual products and access to drinking water in public
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734030

Require schools to let children use the toilet at all times in the school day
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731355
